info.name: Nill (DOGS manga) tumblr cursor
info.description: A Nill cursor designed to work on tumblr (dashboard, activity, etc.). Pointer changes from yellow to dark gray on hover over links. Please report any problem to http://rahxephon.co.vu/
info.additionalInfo: Credit to Shirow Miwa for DOGS: Bullets & Carnage manga and art.
